data.title: Thornhill High School (Gwelo, Rhodesia
data.text:
In Memoriam

P.J. TODD, Thornhill's first Headmaster, died in October 1970.

PETER SIEBERT, former deputy head, died in Switzerland after receiving treatment for a brain tumour.

DAVID BROMLEY was killed in an accident in 1967

MRS MURIEL BROMLEY (Commerce Teacher) passed away in 1972.

LYNNE SMITH died tragically in a car accident on 4 November 1973

JEFF COLLETT, C Sqd Rhodesian SAS, ex-Thornhill High School, Gwelo, killed in 1978 on the external raid into Zambia at Mkushi,

RUSSELL POOLE, Mortar Troop, Support Cdo, 1RLI, killed in action on 19th April 1979 Chiduku TTL, Fire Force contact.

PETER McDONALD, BSAP, was killed on active service on 15 May 1979.

COLIN NEASHAM, 1 Commando Rhodesian Light Infantry, killed in action 6th September 1979, Operation Uric in Mozambique.

KEVIN BOTHMA was killed as a result of a vehicle accident in 1979 whilst on a call-up in the Army.

KATHY BROMLEY passed away in 1979

EDWARD BENZIES was murdered in Zimbabwe in the 80's.

DAVID BENZIES passed away from a heart attack whilst in Cape Town on a training course. He was resident in Zimbabwe.

HOWARD MOFFET (at Thornhill 1968 to 1973) was shot and killed at Kamativi Mine on 2 May 1980.

TONY TEMPLEMORE-WALTERS, sadly passed away in 1980 from gunshot wounds inflicted in an ambush whilst serving on the border with Zambia in Internal Affairs.

GEOFFREY LAMBERT, Headmaster of Thornhill 1962-1967, passed away in Howick, Natal, in April 1986.

VAUGHAN BURDEN died in a work-related accident in January 1987.

THYS LOURENS was shot by dissidents while playing darts at a Sports Club in May 1987. He was at Thornhill 1961-1965.

STEPHEN HEWITT was tragically killed in a motor bike accident on his way to work on 3 July 1987.

ANTHONY (Tony) OWEN passed away tragically in March 1990.

MAARTEN VAN DER VELDEN (known as "Dutch") was tragically killed in a car accident in 1991.

JOY DICKER (nee FERGUSON) died of cancer on 19 April 1991 aged 44.

DEREK RITCHIE died in an accident on 9 May 1991.

OLIVIER CELDRE died in an accident on 2 November 1991.

HENDRIK (Blackie) SWART passed away in 1993.

RICHMAL NORDIN died tragically on 9 November 1993.

SYLVIA MORAINE died of cancer in 1995.

INGRID MARAIS died in 1997, the victim of a bee sting.

NORMAN GRAHAM (Hore) died in a motorbike accident in May 1997.

ALAN BARR, attended Thornhill in the 60s, passed away on 18 November 1998, aged 49.

BRENDA ANN LIGHT died after a heart attack on 8 October 1999.

MRS COVENTRY (teacher) passed away in October 1999.

JAN NEL passed away on 4 Feb 2001.

KAREL DE HAAS died tragically in Wundowie, Perth, Australia, on 5 June 2001. Karel was at Thornhill from 1958 until about June 1963.

BLAKE EVANS (THS 1972-1976) passed away on 30 July 2001.

ANDY EVANS (staff) passed away in 2002.

BARRY JOVNER passed away on 6 November 2002.

GILLIAN ATKINS (formerly Blyth, nee Le Roith), at Thornhill school in the 1960s, passed away in the UK on 11 November 2002

TERRY HART, French teacher and Cranwell House Superintendent, died of cancer in 2002.

NICK HOLMAN, former Maths master, hockey coach and deputy head, died on 28th November 2002 in Edinburgh, Scotland.

JANICE WATKINSON (nee Bossert) at Thornhill until 1966, died in 2003 after a long battle with cancer.

ROBERT (Skippy) TYNE died on 8 March 2003.

LYNETTE FINEGAN (nee Palmer) passed away on 17th September 2003. She was head girl in 1961.

WAYNE ROBERTSON passed away on 24 September 2003.

MARIE (Noddy) PURDON (nee Warrington) passed away on 23 October 2003 aged 44.

KEN VAN BLERK , biology teacher in the 1960's, passed away in Hillcrest, Durban on 12th December 2003.

EILEEN INGLE (nee Bayne) passed away suddenly in Johannesburg on 9th January 2004.

DAVID BOOTHROYD, Thornhill 1970 to 1975. Died in Scotland 7 October 2004.

WILLIAM TREVOR (WALLY) PATTERSON passed away on 2 Sept 2004 from a heart attack. He was at Thornhill 1958 - 1961.

DOODLES VILJOEN (founder member of staff) died suddenly on 25 March 2005 at his home in Gweru.

DAVID PALMER died suddenly on the15th April 2005 in the South of England

GLADYS SMITH, who taught at Thornhill for many years (Music and Afrikaans), passed away in April 2006 after a short illness.

NELLA REECE passed away on 15 April 2006. She was the cook matron at the girls hostel in 1981/82 before moving to Chaplin.

SUE KELLY (nee Duffin) passed away in Buckinghamshire, England, on 20th March 2006 after a brain haemorrhage.

ALEXANDER CHARLES BLACKADDER (at Thornhill late 50s/early 60s) passed away on 25 May 2006 aged 63

DES VAN ROOYEN passed away in 2006. He attended Thornhill High from 1958.

KEVIN CORNISH died on the 20th February 2007 in Plumtree.

KEITH SWARTZ passed away on 14 April 2007

PHILIP ADCOCK passed away on 8th June 2007 at Claybank Hospital, Gweru.

MIRANDA BLOOM passed away in July 2007.

CONNIE OOSTHUYSEN passed away on 2 October 2007.

EDITH LAMB passed away suddenly on the 27 November, 2007

JON EADIE (former Headmaster) passed away in 2007

TONY BOTHMA passed away on 1 January 2008, aged 47.

GRAHAM WEAVER , teacher of Maths and Physics at Thornhill in the mid-seventies, passed away in May 2008.

LESLIE STOUT died in a motorbike accident in Pretoria on the 6th October 2008.

MIKE COLLINS passed away on 28 April 2009

ALAN ROWE was ambushed and shot dead on his farm in the Natal Midlands during the evening of the 13th May 2009.

MURELLE HAYES died suddenly in Harare on 14 June 2009.

HENNIE BAKKES passed away on Thursday 16 June 2009.

DEANNE VAN HUYSSTEEN (nee Van Heerden ) Died suddenly in Pretoria, on the 29th August 2009. She left Thornhill in 1964.

REG WICKENS passed away in September 2009.

ROY KALIL died on 9 April 2010 from cancer of the stomach.

ANGELA GREGORY (nee HOUSHOLD) passed away in October 2010 after a battle with liver cancer.

DON LAWRENCE died 12th March 2011 of a heart attack in Somerset West, Cape.

BRIAN AUTHERS died 9 June 2011 aged 63

KAREN BYRNE (Thornhill 1972 to 1975) passed away in August 2011 after a battle with cancer

SHELLEY KNOTT passed away 21 October 2011.

KATHY JENKINS (nee TILLETT) passed away on 28 July 2012 aged 56.

WAYNE DEREK JEREMIAH passed away on 5 August 2013.

KATHY VAN BEURDEN (nee BALLANTYNE) passed away on 25 October 2013 after a lengthy illness.

SHIRLEY LAMB passed away on 8 November 2013.

BRENDA ALDERSON (nee BUDD) passed away on November 23rd 2013 after a tough fight with cancer.

BLAIR WHITE passed away in November 2013 after a battle with cancer.

RORY HARBINSON passed away on December 12th 2013 after a long battle with cancer.

MARGIE CUNLIFFE (teacher) passed away 12 January 2014 after a battle with cancer.

PETER BARLOW passed away on 5 March 2014, aged 66.

PAM BATES (nee DAVIES) passed away on 6 March 2014.

MICHAEL BRETT SMITH passed away on 15 April 2014.

AILEEN BOTHMA (nee VAN BREDA) passed away in South Africa on 15 October 2014.

PIET RAUTENBACH passed away on 15 Oct 2014 after a 4 year struggle with Steele Richardson Syndrome.

SUDDEN BEKKER passed away on 16 October 2014 after a short illness.

WYN DALLAS passed away suddenly on 26 October 2014.

ERNIE VENTER passed away on 6 November 2014 after suffering a stroke.

JUNE (JUANITA) BADENHORST (nee SWART) passed away in November 2014.

MURIEL RICHARDSON (English teacher in the 1960s) passed away in 2014.

CAROLE NATHANSON (nee BELL) passed away in January 2015 in Port Elizabeth.

ANDY NIMMO (teacher) passed away in UK on 27 January 2015.

CHERYL McKIE (nee SPENCER) passed away on 23 May 2015.

JUDY MAUREEN PARKIN passed away on 14 December 2016.

GARRICK ANTHONY RAYMOND SMITH passed away on 21st January 2017.

JOHN (JOSS) NESBITT passed away on 14 August 2017 in Johannesburg.

GLEN KALIL passed away on 26 Oct 2017 in Cape Town.

ROD GILES ( one of the THS "pioneer" pupils) passed away unexpectedly due to cardiac arrest on 10 December 2017 in Canberra, Australia.

RUTH WOLFFE passed away in December 2017 after a battle with cancer.

ETHEL DIMSTER (Head Girl in 1986) passed away on 29 December 2017.

ATTIE ("Monk") BOTHA (THS 1960 - 64) passed away on 3 February 2018 in South Africa.

COURTNEY FERGUSON (pupil in 1959 and 1960) passed away on 12 June 2018 in Harare of multiple organ failure.

JUDY (nee Beattie) van AARDT passed away on 12 July 2018 after a long struggle with Multiple Sclerosis.

ROB THOMPSON (at Thornhill 1971 - 1974) passed away in November 2018.

EM CHAMBERLAIN (Latin and History teacher) passed away on 16 July 2019 aged 88.

JAMES (Jim) WELSH (former pupil and member of staff) passed away on 15 July 2019 aged 67.

RODNEY PALMER, ex Thornhill about 1960/61, brother to Geneva, Chris, Philip, Dianne and the late Lynette, Basil and David, passed away on 2 OCtober 2019.

SUE (DONALDSON) VORSTER passed away in South Africa in December 2020.

DAVE SCULLY passed away in March 2021.
